params.name: source
params.description: The source image path, URL, a variable that is read into the new image, or a Java buffered image.

params.name: width
params.description: The width of the new image. Valid when the height is specified and the source is not.

params.name: height
params.description: The height of the new image. Valid when the width is specified and the source is not.

params.name: imagetype
params.description: The type of the image to create (Valid only when width and height are specified),

params.name: canvascolor
params.description:
Color of the image canvas. Possible values are:

Hexadecimal value of RGB color. For example, specify the color white as ##FFFFFF or FFFFFF.
String value of color (for example, 'black', 'red', 'green').
List of three numbers for (R,G,B) values. Each value must be in the range 0-255.

examples.description: Use the imageNew function to create a 200x200-pixel image in ARGB format.
